A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A very enjoyable entry into the Star Wars Franchise. I saw this twice in the theaters\, and again recently. The film may have many small flaws\, but I think that as a whole\, it is very enjoyable and did a great job with all of the characters\, especially Kylo\, and Rey. I am excited to see how this trilogy ends\, and I think this was a pretty good middle chapter in it.
